scene_title: SCENE III.  A chapel in PAULINA'S house.

line_text: My ill suspicion. This is your son-in-law,
scene_title: SCENE III.  A chapel in PAULINA'S house.

line_text: And son unto the king, who, heavens directing,
scene_title: SCENE III.  A chapel in PAULINA'S house.

line_text: Is troth-plight to your daughter. Good Paulina,
scene_title: SCENE III.  A chapel in PAULINA'S house.

line_text: Lead us from hence, where we may leisurely
scene_title: SCENE III.  A chapel in PAULINA'S house.

line_text: Each one demand an answer to his part
scene_title: SCENE III.  A chapel in PAULINA'S house.

line_text: Perform'd in this wide gap of time since first
scene_title: SCENE III.  A chapel in PAULINA'S house.

line_text: We were dissever'd: hastily lead away.
scene_title: SCENE III.  A chapel in PAULINA'S house.
